about_the_game:
In a realm where silence is a rarity, particularly in the vibrant backdrop of Thailand, we aspire to introduce a unique silent game that masterfully conveys the characters' emotions and expressions. Through deliberate non-verbal communication or unrelated dialogue, players will immerse themselves in a narrative where they assume the role of a robot working for a company.

Uncover the Truth and Solve the Problem


This dystopian world, plagued by relentless acid rain, burdens players with the vital mission of fulfilling our leaders' last wish: to operate a machine that can restore the world's former glory. However, our path is obstructed by an AI security system that has grown excessively stringent, ultimately leading to the company's demise. To succeed, we must complete our assigned tasks while evading the ever-watchful AI.

  • Relentless acid rain

The player has to figure out a way to complete the assigned tasks using the environment to solve challenging puzzles. Some may require the use of water or acidic water to solve them. Be on the lookout because it could also destroy you.

Key Features:

  • Interacting With Object
  • Water / Acidic Water
  • Puzzle Solving

name: Eternal Acid Rain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
